channel.title: Electronic Dance Music has no soul
channel.description:
Apparently.
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0prFicLgXxw B Complex - Beautiful Lies
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=2ZjbCkRJq44 Plastician - Japan (Yes, I am aware of the heavy sample in this track and where it's from :P)
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xao_IFohe_c Justice - Phantom pt. II
Tried to get a bit of a spread on the genres so I wasn't biasing d'n'b too heavily ;)
My challenge to non-EDM-peeps - whether you like it or not, can you listen to those three tracks and honestly say that there is no soul, no heart, in electronic music?

item.source: Electronic Dance Music has no soul

item.title: Electronic Dance Music has no soul
item.dc:creator: @ThAt0n36Uy Elijah
item.description:
@ThAt0n36Uy wrote:

I think that when music is conveying an emotion of some sort, that you would say it has depth to it. Infact, most if not all music has the sole purpose of communicating some message. So to say ‘EDM’ doesn’t have any soul would be incorrect. If you listen to Orchestral music, it’s pretty obvious from the get go it has soul to it. And this is on the same level imo.

Read full topic
item.source: Electronic Dance Music has no soul

item.title: Electronic Dance Music has no soul
item.dc:creator: @Mopman Mopman
item.description:
@Mopman wrote:

i dunno how well linked “having soul” and stimulating your mind are, maybe i should be less abstract

but there seems to be this widespread opinion that electronic music is cold and calculated and has no heart, and “zomg ppl only find meaning in it because theyre on durgz”

which i dont agree with

edit: oh and yes justice are awesome

Read full topic

item.title: Electronic Dance Music has no soul
item.dc:creator: @Mopman Mopman
item.description:
@Mopman wrote:

Aha, just thought of a better track (and video) to fight for dnb in my favour

YouTube

Hospital Records

The Official Hospital Records Channel. Uploads everyday of all the best Drum & Bass, latest music videos, exclusives, interviews, Hospitality parties, and pr...

No message?

Oh, and the best way to show the “message” for the first track is to pretty much watch http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=8yCqi75LdHc&feature=fvw (it uses it as a soundtrack)

No need to apologise for a different opinion btw

Read full topic

item.title: Electronic Dance Music has no soul
item.dc:creator: @Eh_Pretty_Easy Eh Pretty Easy
item.description:
@Eh_Pretty_Easy wrote:

Sorry but what the shit is this? I have to disagree with your likes. The music, if that’s what you call it, says nothing in these samples. There is no message - for me at least. The first and third are bad, although I kinda like the second one :p, there is that little something (?), but still, even that isn’t enough to, in this case, make me wanna listen to more stuff of this genre. Sorry

Read full topic
